title: Google Analytics data transfer to U.S. brings $1 million fine to Swedish firms
description: The Swedish Authority for Privacy Protection (Integritetsskyddsmyndigheten - IMY) has fined two companies with 12.3 million SEK (€1 million/$1.1 million) for using Google Analytics and warned two others about the same practice. [...]

title: New Python tool checks NPM packages for manifest confusion issues
description: A security researcher and system administrator has developed a tool that can help users check for manifest mismatches in packages from the NPM JavaScript software registry. [...]
